reviewText: bought this for my 86 year old german neighbor and she loved it!
This concert was wonderful. I have all their albums and they never disappoint. IL Volvo they just keep getting better.
Everything I expected and more.  Great DVD.  Love it!!
They are fantastic, my second DVD. Nice to see them growing up.
Love
What a great concert.  I have watched this video more than 10 times.  It is excellent.  I'm looking forward to more of the same.
Awesome
We love these singers--they're just amazing!
vocal and orchestra well balanced
These young men are amazing and the DVD is awesome
Amazing!  So wonderful!
World's best singers!!!!
They don't disappoint!
Excellent vocals, very listenable.  Il Volo blends their voices perfectly, and their enthusiasm comes through.
Excellent!

This is one of their best DVD's.  Listen to them all the time, but even better when you get to look at them on DVD!!!!!  Since I discovered them, they are all I listen to.  Why waste time listening to anything else when I could be enjoying  IL  VOLO!!!!!
Just love anything these young men do!
I like this dvid because they have some songs difference than all the rest.

These 3 young Italian classico-pop singers seem
to have improved their beautiful vocal ability since
their first CD.Now their voices especially Fiero's
has reached the standard of the oiginal 3 tenors.
Their stage presence and interaction with the audience is excellent.
I have all the group's DVD's. Love them all but this is by far the best.
I'm a big fan of this group I. They are young and fun to watch
I listen to them all the time.  they are my favorite group
Great talents !  A joy to watch and see their gifts !
My parents love this!

These guys are beyond terrific. I had bought the CD a year+ ago and finally decided I wanted to see who was singing what. This is a lovely DVD excepting the wacko dancing pixels set behind the first song We Are Love. Everything else was delightful (It'd be even better if I knew Italian). We Are Love
Everything Il Volo does is done exceptionally well. Their voices are unbelievable considering their ages.
